entry.title: Sailboat, A Full-rigged Ship Charm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Watchus
Type: Charm - Medium
Price: 6.00 - 13.50 (7 variants)

If you love to sail this charm is for you. Feel the ocean breeze blow warmly on your face then dream of coconut palm trees swaying on your island get away.  Eat a mango on board ship, go for an excursion or fall asleep below with a great book.
